content: besides triangular shawls i love designing rectangular ones as they are working up fast and can be used in many different ways enjoy my newest design the **lassë shawl** which is super easy and quick to make this pattern is available for **free on my blog** here 1 or you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **difficulty ** beginner **finished size ** 158 cm/62 25 long and 44 cm/17 25 wide **gauge ** unimportant as your garment will be blocked upon finishing to the size given **us terms** used throughout **written pattern only with no chart** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2021/02/10/lasse-shawl/
